title: What is the purpose of ATOUM circles and how does their magical path differ from traditional religions?
first_phrase: This text describes the magical path followed by certain members of the ATOUM order. The author explains that the majority of the circles and orders don't know about the objective state of the path and their phases of graduation are only a sign of self-satisfaction. The final 200 tokens focus on two exercises the ATOUM order practices - maintaining upright posture and collecting sensory perceptions without verbalizing or thinking about them, and reviewing one's day. These exercises don't require following a particular belief system, and magic is not an obstacle to spiritual exploration, according to the author.
